_sText:
Hey guys ! You want to add real zombies in you'r map ? You have all things that you need here !
In this prefab you have :
- 2 Survivors
- 1 Zombie Torso and
- 1 Zombie Classic

The Zombies can hurt you ! They move ! So , Watch out ! and they can be killed ( survivors too )
With realistic sounds and mouvements :)

Watch this video for a complet description :

[Click Here For Wath](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i_aTPo-ghDw&feature=youtu.be "Video")

D'ont forget to creat a way for the 2 zombies and the 2 survivors because they follow him.

Thx for dowload and don't forget to rate and comment :)
